alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 2:51PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Lake Kampeska At Watertown Water Plant affecting Codington County. .Warm temperatures led to snow melt and increased river and lake levels. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lake Kampeska At Watertown Water Plant. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Yards around the lake begin to flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM CDT Friday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued late Saturday night by 1200 AM CDT.
